Description.SourceString: Passive skills happen automatically. Although they can be easy to ignore, Passives can have a big impact on your effectiveness. Many Passive skills require a condition to be met to trigger. For example, many Heroes have Passives that trigger when they kill an enemy, and some Heroes have Passive skills that trigger when they die.
